title: Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Public Health (Tobacco Products and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Public Health (Tobacco Products and 

Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (Commencement) (No. 3) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited public health (tobacco product nicotine inhaling products) act 2023 (commencement) (no 3) order 2024

title: Nicotine Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 2nd day of February 2026 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 2nd day of February 2026 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Public Health (Tobacco Products and Nicotine 
Inhaling Products) Act 2023 (No. 35 of 2023) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

subsections (1)(a), (1)(b) and (2) of section 9; 

(b) Part 2; 

(c) 

section 25; 

(d) 

 section 27; 

(e) 

(f) 

(g) 

(h) 

section 32; 

section 34; 

section 39; 

subsections (c) and (e) of section 45. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 December, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd January, 2025.
